Postharvest Videos

Blurb

CIMMYT and IRRI are working with National partners to address the primary problems of

Many of these videos are located on Youtube - As a result, we are in the process of compiling and storing on our web for access within Pakistan

Postharvest Grain loss

  • Bulk transportation (4 minutes - Scientific Animations Without Borders, Univ. Illinois)
  • Grain bag transportation (3 minutes - Scientific Animations Without Borders, Univ. Illinois)
  • Prevention of Postharvest grain losses (6 minutes - Scientific Animations Without Borders, Univ. Illinois)

Rice

  • Harvesting systems. Rice Harvesting Systems (7 minutes IRRI)

    • Moisture measurement

    • Using an IRRI Moisture Meter (5.5 minutes IRRI)
    • Measuring Rice Grain Moisture Content (6.75 minutes IRRI)

    Drying

    • Sun Drying Rice Grains (6 minutes IRRI)
    • Paddy (Unhusked Rice) Drying Methods (5.75 minutes IRRI)

    Storage

    • Hermetically sealed grain storage (5.5 minutes - IRRI)
    • IRRI Rice Super Bag (4 minutes IRRI)

    Quality assessment

    • Using the IRRI Rice Quality Assessment Kit (9 Minutes IRRI)
    • Measuring White Rice Quality (10 minutes - IRRI)
    • Measuring Paddy (Unhusked Rice) Quality (12 minutes IRRI)
  • Milling systems. Rice Milling Systems (5.5 minutes IRRI)
